letter_to_editor.subject: Fireworks are a blast

p.problem: It’s time for Massachusetts to join the rest of the country and legalize the use of consumer fireworks
p.citation: (“N.Y. man arrested with fireworks in Massachusetts,” June 25).
p.support: This will be the second year New York is permitting the sale and use of some consumer fireworks, and the results have been very successful.
Since 1994, there has been a dramatic increase in the rate of fireworks used in the U.S. During the same time period, the rate of fireworks-related injures has gone down.

p.solution: Massachusetts should join the 47 states that permit some level of consumer fireworks.

letter_to_editor.author: — William A. Weimar, vice president, Phantom Fireworks, Youngstown, Ohio
